name: The Choice (Gudner, DonutDrifter)
description:
Made for United Game Jam 2020 
The game is named "The Choice" and it's a pretty hard platformer.
It tells the story of a little circle who should choose which of TWO ways to go and which of TWO colours to become - red or blue. His fate will depend on this choice!
All of the assets were created by ourselves.

Are you a Beginner?
Yes

Does your team consist of all Beginners?
Yes
